review: Better than expected. My Grandchildren love the cartoon movies and I love the action movies. Really cool for us.
author: George Souza "Educator"

review: Bought this for my daughter...a week later I bought one for our living room...I am seriously Considering buying another for my bedroom. It's perfect. Fast. Little. I love it. The remote stopped working for one I'm pretty sure my daughter broke it I bought a replacement remote and that was easy to set up and I would totally buy one for every room.
author: desiree

review: Easy install, effortlessly turned my dumb TV into a smart TV. I like it!
author: Jim

review: Really enjoy this TV Stick.  It is fast, has an app for youtube and netflix and allows me access to amazon prime via my membership.
author: LJT

review: The Fire Stick will only come on when I unplug and replug it. Had I realized this was a design issue, I probably would  not have purchased it. It is a PAIN to use right now. My Sony Smart DVD is way more reliable than this Fire TV Stick. Instead of investing in another Stick, I will just get another Smart DVD player.....
author: Connie Williams
